channel.title: Server Base?
channel.description:
Whats the diffrence between server bases? Whats bad about delta?
I ask this because people comment "Delta :( gj anyway" "Dude its delta :(" "not downloading its delta"

item.title: Server Base?
item.dc:creator: @plompke plompke
item.description:
@plompke wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:4, topic:348608”][quote author=matiasmunk link=topic=444987.msg3267318#msg3267318 date=1278960140]
Differences, are the features, like on Pvp planets base theres loads of features, but low economy, not much stable tho…
and on soulsplits source, there are loads of features, and good economy, good pvp/pk source, and so on and its more stable, it can hold up to 2500 players with no lag… The real soulsplit owner had 1700 players on once no lag at all…
[/quote]

I think your a little over reaching with those numbers, the max number of clients that can connect to the server are 2147.[/quote] 2147 is more then 1700 so it can be

Read full topic

item.title: Server Base?

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Delta is bad because it is over used, it is easy to profit off of with little change, people act like its the best source out.
